It references the management of evidence related to the Epstein and Nygard cases, and instructs agents on telework procedures and maintaining readiness for investigations, including those into child exploitation.

events.title: FBI NYO COVID-19 Operational Update
events.description: The FBI New York Field Office issues guidance on telework, designating all employees as mission critical but limiting physical presence in the office to 20% per squad due to the pandemic.
